casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 16, 2013

[Cite as 05116/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-0hio-1980.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Ealy.

On February 18, 2009, this court found Larry E. Ealy to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03. This court further ordered that Ealy was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On May 14, 2013, Ealy presented a motion for leave to file.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file is denied.
